title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Two points for explaining how and where Buddhism spread through expansion diffusion.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
